description:
The mysteries of ninjutsu enthrall the Straw Hats as Raizo, the implausible ninja, makes his true powers known! Meanwhile, a mysterious artifact points the way towards the end of the Grand Line!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Red Stone! A Guide to the One Piece!
Akai Ishi! "One Piece" e no Michishirube
Der rote Stein! – Ein Wegweiser zum One Piece
Une stèle rouge ! Un guide pour le One Piece
Красный камень! Указатель пути к One Piece!
حجر أحمر! دليل إلى الوان بيس!
赤い石! "ひとつなぎの大秘宝[ワンピース]" への道標
